description.value: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Crossbow]{Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Hand Crossbow]{Hand Crossbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Trident]{Tridents}, and all azarketi weapons in which you are trained.
